title: Is it okay to write my Common App essay on bullying? Is it too serious? - Quora

response.answer_text: This is a great question. I don’t think it’s a bad idea - with so many students getting bullied across the country, finding a viable solution or risk mitigation to bully may be something worth pursuing. It can not only be helpful in your extracurricular activity, but also may be a driving point in your application. In fact, a high school student named Trisha Prabhu (Trisha Prabhu) did exactly this, and earned an early acceptance to Harvard.
